Merge #7206 #7231

7206: Use hir::GenericParam in ide_db::Definition instead of relisting all 3 r=Veykril a=Veykril

Basically just this:
```diff
 pub enum Definition {
     Macro(MacroDef),
     Field(Field),
     ModuleDef(ModuleDef),
     SelfType(Impl),
     Local(Local),
-    TypeParam(TypeParam),
-    LifetimeParam(LifetimeParam),
-    ConstParam(ConstParam),
+    GenericParam(GenericParam),
     Label(Label),
 }
```
